      Gets the organisation from the data base.
      Organisation OrganisationDAO.getOrganisationByApiKey(String apiKey)
      Gets all organisations which are associated with the specific API key.

    • Uses of Organisation in info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.entities

      Methods in info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.entities that return Organisation 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Organisation Role.getBelongsTo()
      Gets the organisation which the role belongs to and in which a player can have this role.
      Organisation PlayerLevel.getBelongsTo()
      Gets the organisation which the player level belongs to.
      Organisation PlayerGroup.getBelongsTo()
      The organisation the group belongs to.
      Organisation Player.getBelongsTo()
      Gets the organisation a player belongs to.
      Methods in info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.entities with parameters of type Organisation 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Role.belongsTo(Organisation organisation)
      This method checks if the API key of a role is equal to the organisation's one, which means the role belongs to this organisation.
      boolean PlayerGroup.belongsTo(Organisation organisation)
      This method checks if a group belongs to a specific organisation.
      void Role.setBelongsTo(Organisation belongsTo)
      Sets the organisation which the role belongs to and in which a player can have this role.
      void PlayerLevel.setBelongsTo(Organisation belongsTo)
      Sets the organisation which the level belongs to and in which a player can award it.
      void PlayerGroup.setBelongsTo(Organisation belongsTo)
      Sets the organisation to which this group belongs.
      void Player.setBelongsTo(Organisation belongsTo)
      Sets the organisation a player belongs to.
